title: Lesson 3 - One Minute Czech
itunes:title: Lesson 3 - One Minute Czech
description:
In this lesson you will learn to say that you speak a little Czech.

One Minute Czech is released weekly and this series features a total of ten lessons. If you’d like to learn faster, use our video versions and lesson booklet, available on the Coffee Break Academy.

One Minute Czech is a production of the Coffee Break Academy for Radio Lingua Ltd.
